thread.title: Perfect hotel for a quick weekend getaway
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel for a quick weekend getaway - Review of The Standard, High Line, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DROJC
title: Perfect hotel for a quick weekend getaway
text:
Wife and I love this hotel for a quick weekend getaway.
Very cool hotel with great restaurants. Amazing location for people watching. The high line is right there too!
The beer garden is fun. The room we had was quite spacious and well appointed with very interesting decor. The one thing I can do without is the glass wall between the shower and the room (not our thing!).
It's on the pricier side, but worth it!
